meaningMnemonic: A <radical>Viking</radical> <radical>insect</radical> is a <kanji>firefly</kanji>. In the insect kingdom, the insect most resembling a Viking is undoubtedly the firefly.
readingMnemonic: The Viking <kanji>firefly</kanji> is attacking <reading>Hotaru</reading> (ほたる) Tomoe (alter ego of Sailor Saturn) because the Viking firefly hates the show Sailor Moon and everyone on it. Hotaru screams in terror as she is deathly afraid of fireflies, especially Viking ones.
